welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Canonsburg, where small-town hospitality meets big-city charm. Known for its rich history and beautiful scenery, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is the main terminal of County Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Allegheny County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Allegheny County Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pittsburgh International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Pittsburgh International Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Pittsburgh International Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Pittsburgh International Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Pittsburgh International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
